member.name: ID3D10EffectPass.Apply
member.summary: Set the state contained in a pass to the device.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectPass.ComputeStateBlockMask
member.summary: Generate a mask for allowing/preventing state changes.
member.param: A pointer to a state-block mask (see ).
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectPass.GetDesc
member.param: A pointer to a pass description (see ).
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectPass.GetGeometryShaderDesc
member.param: A pointer to a geometry-shader description (see ).
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectPass.GetPixelShaderDesc
member.param: A pointer to a pixel-shader description (see ).
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectPass.GetVertexShaderDesc
member.param: A pointer to a vertex-shader description (see ).
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectPass.IsValid
member.summary: Test a pass to see if it contains valid syntax.
member.returns: TRUE if the code syntax is valid; otherwise FALSE.
